justification: Vendor 3 addresses provisioning, configuration, maintenance (firmware updates), monitoring (telemetry collection), and diagnostics for IoT devices, stating 'comprehensive IoT and edge device management'. It references standard compliance (IEC 62443, ISO/IEC 27001, NIST SP 800-53) and supports multiple relevant protocols. However, explicit mention of device authentication and Digital Twin environment integration is missing, partially limiting alignment with the full requirement.
ability: The ability to provision and authenticate, configure, maintain, monitor and diagnose connected IoT devices operating as part of Digital Twin environment
